markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Luhar (The Setting Sun)](/Deities.aspx?ID=216)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 139 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

The Lioness Goddess of death, dreams, and destiny. She is most commonly depicted as a lioness with the head of a human woman, dark skinned with bright eyes.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Old Sun Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=19)

**Edicts** learn about the night and prepare yourself to face its creatures and dangers, always make time for sleeping and dreams, ensure others never go to sleep scared

**Anathema** stay up all night without any breaks for sleeping or dreaming, attack a person or creature while they sleep, leave a badly wounded opponent alive and suffering

**Area of Concern**
death, dreams, and destiny

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, LE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

**Favored Weapon** [Spiked Chain](/Weapons.aspx?ID=60)

**Domains** [Cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=3), [Darkness](/Domains.aspx?ID=6), [Dreams](/Domains.aspx?ID=9), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=29)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=12), [Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=51), [Star](/Domains.aspx?ID=52), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)

- **3rd**
[Invisibility Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=165)

- **5th**
[Shadow Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=275)

</column>
name: Luhar (The Setting Sun)
